DOC.brief_summary: Comparison heal response treatment complex bifurcation lesion dedicate bifurcation device ( Axxess™ Biolimus Eluting Coronary Bifurcation Stent System + Absorb BVS distal branch ) versus Modified T stenting technique use Absorb BVS : optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) analysis .
DOC.brief_title: COmplex Bifurcation PCI : AXXESS Device + Absorb BVS , v Modified T Stenting With Absorb BVS
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective single center randomize clinical trial baseline OCT clinical , angiographic OCT follow-up thirty month . Patients true complex coronary bifurcation lesion randomly assign treatment dedicate Axxess biolimus-eluting bifurcation stent proximal main vessel ( MV ) additional Absorb everolimus-eluting BVS branch versus modify T technique use Absorb BVS . The primary endpoint change minimal luminal area assess OCT baseline 30 month pre-specified bifurcation segment . The main aim ass acute performance compare long-term vessel heal optical coherence tomography , clinical angiographic outcome treatment complex bifurcation lesion dedicate stent additional Absorb Bioabsorbable scaffold ( BVS ) versus modify T stenting technique Absorb BVS .
